description:
TPO 047 T29 Lime- remove regrowth formed since most recent reduction (2-3m) back to previous points; remove epicormics; removal of arisings (25-50m)
TPO 047 T32 Sycamore - remove regrowth formed since most recent reduction (2-3m) back to previous points; remove epicormics; removal of arisings (0-25m); parking suspensions
TPO 047 T34 Holly - crown lift 2.4m; removal of arisings (0-25m); 
TPO 047 T35 Lime - parking suspensions; remove regrowth formed since most recent reduction (2-3m) back to previous points; remove epicormics; removal of arisings (0-25m)         
T36 Hornbeam - young tree maintenance
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The replacement tree must be planted on or near the existing tree by April 2025; T10 Horse chestnut should be replaced with a tree of the Birch species (Betula spp.) of your choice. T13 Hawthorn should be replaced with a Hawthron (Crataegus monogyna) and both replacements must be of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted.
